content: tiny pants skill level easy by megan goodacre you never know when you re going to need a pair of tiny pants this pattern is for a simple seamless diaper cover great for photo shoots the pattern instructions are given for two sizes but since babies come in all shapes and sizes i ve included some tips on how to modify the pattern this pattern is suitable for the beginner knitter who is
